Corey Perry

Full Name: Corey Perry

(Scorey, Perrs, The Worm)

Position: RW •  Shoots: Right

6-3, 208lb (190cm, 94kg)

Team: Los Angeles Kings

Draft: Anaheim, 1st round (28th overall), 2003 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: London Knights

Pronunciation: \KOHR-ee PAIR-ee\

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Corey Perry?

Corey Perry is 40 years old.

When was Corey Perry born?

Corey Perry was born on May 16, 1985.

Where was Corey Perry born?

Corey Perry was born in Peterborough, Canada.

How tall is Corey Perry?

Corey Perry is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Corey Perry weigh?

Corey Perry weighs 208 lbs (94 kg).

How many goals does Corey Perry have?

Corey Perry had 19 goals last season and 448 goals over his career.

How many points does Corey Perry have?

Corey Perry had 30 points last season and 935 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Corey Perry won?

Corey Perry has won 1 Stanley Cup as a player.
